name: The Impossible Cube Maze Game
description:
The most impossible, perplexing, and discombobulating game ever!
Can you reach the center of the cube? Put your skills to the test, because this game will challenge you like never before.

Your task is to journey to the center of a colossal cube composed of hundreds to millions of smaller cubes. Don't get lost...

Leave a trail of breadcrumbs as you color every cube you meet.

• Relaxing music to make you think and not lose your mind
• Six difficulties from hundreds to millions of cubes
• Three impossible game modes
